response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable. This product holds immense significance and value to both of us, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $1,150,000. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
